mapper.select: select c.cart_num, c.goods_num, c.email, o.o_num, o.o_time, o.o_people, o.o_date, g.img, to_char(o.o_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') o_date2, g.title, g.price, g.discount from cart c inner join goods_option o on c.o_num=o.o_num inner join goods g on g.goods_num=c.goods_num where c.email=#{m_pk}
select count(*) from cart where email=#{m_pk}
